price: Na ͻnyε nkwa-boaa a, efiri ahobae a, ehwie anaa epue ba no mu?
arabic: أَلَمۡ يَكُ نُطۡفَةٗ مِّن مَّنِيّٖ يُمۡنَىٰ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: alam yaku nuṭ'fatan min maniyyin yum'nā
